FloatingDraw Hint Unknown Error Occurred Failed to load Image File Saved Invalid File Format OK Cancel "File Already Existes " File name has invalid Characters Save as : File name cannot be Empty*
Select storage Internal SD Card Root Wrong folder selected, please select the root folder of your SD card SD card and USB device paths cannot be the same You seem to have the app installed on an SD card, that makes the app widgets unavailable. You won\'t even see them on the list of available widgets. It is a system limitation, so if you want to use the widgets, you have to move the app back on the internal storage. New Folder
